rooms.description: Large open space at entrance with Vastu-friendly layout ensuring auspicious entry.
spacious living area oriented towards the garden, with north-east facing openings for Vastu compliance.
Modern dining space adjacent to the living room with views of the garden.
Fully equipped modern kitchen placed in a southeast corner, following Vastu norms for fire element.
Space allocated for storage and cleaning utilities with north-west orientation to balance energies.
Guest bedroom with a spacious balcony overlooking the garden for relaxation and fresh air.
Spacious master bedroom with a dedicated balcony ensuring privacy and serene views.
Attached bathroom for master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort.
Dedicated space for work or study with east-facing windows to harness positive energy.
Additional storage space for household items and equipment.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented in the Vastu compliant direction for wealth and energy.
Secondary entrance door ensuring proper circulation of air and light.
Large windows in living room for ample natural light and garden view.
Kitchen window aligning with Vastu principles of fire element, ensuring proper ventilation.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the first floor with a spacious balcony facing the garden for fresh air.
Additional bedroom on the first floor with a private balcony designed for relaxation.
Additional bedroom on the first floor with a spacious balcony for enjoying natural surroundings.

Shared bathroom on the first floor for guest usage.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground floor and first floor, ensuring easy circulation.

rooms.description: Expansive terrace with garden elements, outdoor seating and space for relaxation.
